title: Verdade (A)
body:
The first issue of this Catholic newspaper, which lasted for several years, appeared on January 23, 1875.

In 1915, another periodical with the same name appeared, which published the first issue on May 1, ending with issue no. 216 on November 3, 1919.

1875: First issue of this Catholic newspaper appeared
1915: First issue of the periodical with the same name appeared
